alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 10:12AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN WEBER...NORTH CENTRAL JUAB...SOUTHEASTERN BOX ELDER...WESTERN SALT LAKE...DAVIS...WEST CENTRAL UTAH AND EASTERN TOOELE COUNTIES... At 1010 AM MDT...A snow squall was along a line extending from 14 miles northwest of Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway to 9 miles northwest of Grantsville to 12 miles southwest of Dugway English Village...and moving east at 40 mph. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Ogden, Layton, Tooele, Grantsville, Dugway English Village, Hill Air Force Base, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Roy, Clearfield, Syracuse, Herriman, Clinton, Stansbury Park, Riverdale, Hooper and Perry. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 334 and 340, between mile markers 346 and 347, and between mile markers 352 and 360. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 54 and 116. * strong winds in excess of 45 mph have been observed with this squall. * sudden and brief snowfall rates of 1 inch per hour are possible in this squall, along with graupel and some rumbles of thunder. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
